values:
fuck, im so pissed off. i hate posting this kinda crap but i have nothing else to say.

grounding=sucks

mr.someone=a jerk

mr.someone2=big time jerk

my sister slapped me yesterday haha bitch that left a pretty mark.

im thinking about running away, i cant stay here for another week! 
 
Turnabout is coming up, i donno who im asking NOW. 

Don't you hate it when people do jerky things to people that they definatly dont deserve especialy if they do it to your best friend, yea i hate that too....RAWR

alright well im going to go now.

I LOVE YOU MY LOLLIPOP!

<333hil
http://xnameless.livejournal.com/3510.html

OOO children look whose grounded. This pretty much sucks the big one. I definatly failed geometry so im going to be in the house till some untimely date...And im not aloud on the computer...ooopss i forgot ;-) haha. 

Aw man, i re-aranged my room, i dont think it could get any cooler!

My sister in law had a baby wednesday, his name is Marco...isnt that sweet. YAY now im a Auntie to three little kiddies...wahooo...So im going to go visit the little guy today. He is super cute if i knew how to post a picture i would show you him but im stupid.

Yesterday was so boaring you have no idea hopefully someone will come over tonight...mhm u know what i meen. 

I better get off be for my dad comes in like a crazy fuck. 

Love ya my lollipop!

<333hil
http://xnameless.livejournal.com/3138.html

Hello kids! This weekend was a fun one yay! 

Lets start with Friday...WELL that was the lame part of the weekend I had gymnastics till 5 30 and then no one wanted to do anything, i had a idea of something to do but nooooo :-( so i stayed home.I ended up hanging out with my sister and her friends Brittany and Jolie..they're some sweet gals. 

Saturday i had to get up and fucking 6:55 in the morning to shower and be at school at 8 for confrence for gymnastics...WHICH WE WON...FIRST PLACE BABY YEAH! Later on i went over to Jackies house with Mal and Nicole to get ready for the polar bear beach bash, yep i did just say the polar bear beach bash haha. I ended up leaving that and walked to johns and from johns we went over to dans. We pretty much just loafed around and watched Sweet Sixteen, those spoiled little bitches, im jealous. Dans dad gave me a ride home, what i nice guy haha. I went to sleep at like 9:30 im such a bad ass....

TODAY woohoo i got to sleep in only till 10:30 because my dog came in to attack me. Me and my sister made cheese sticks for lunch they were yummy! At like three laura batora, pretty much the funniest person ever called to go to the mall. So we went. We saw this one dude and Dip and Dots haha he said hey really load so I thought he was talking to me so i screamed hey back and then started laughing because i wasnt sure who he was talking to but then he was following us around so i think he was saying hey to us..haha were losers. Mk so all i got was a shirt and a pair of pants so did laura they are all super cute. 

RARW god poop it school tom kids. This blows. i kinda lost my French homework so I wont be doing that and i have been avoiding my Math all weekend haha i better be going to do that...and im getting kinda scared of my basement haha.

Love you my lollipops

<3hill
http://xnameless.livejournal.com/2996.html

Today, a good day in the neighborhood!

School was cool, i learned...nothing but, it was a good old time. My art class is pretty sweet got some pretty cool chicks Kim and Crystal in it.

I was sapposed to have gymnastics from 3 to 5 30 but kate the great got me out early! So we drove to target and got the best of Marilyn Manson cd....haha its awsome....THE BEAUTIFUL PEOPLE!

Hmmmm Pickerman's a good eatin' resturant, yep kids thats what i had for dinner today! Twas yummy. I advise you to check that out and look for a super cute guy Jordan, you'll like him trust me. HA!

That was my dad kiddies, now im just sitting around listening to some music and talking on the phone...

Love ya my lollipops!

O O i almost forgot !!CAUTION!! interesting fact time....Marily Manson got some of his ribs removed so, yes you guessed, to suck him self off...sick, i think so!

hill<3333
http://xnameless.livejournal.com/2567.html

Since I re-did Hilly's journal, I'm entitle to a post, right? Well, I should think so.

Just to let you all know, this is Brittany Marie Calvert. I am Kate's, as well as Hilly's, bffaeaeaelylas4lyfe. And, um, I'm really cool, and pretty too, just ask Hill. I don't know any of you, except for John, Dan, and Elena (sp? sorry!), but John loves me the most. It's true.

I think that Sofie is really rad, and I think that Hilly's pretty rad too, in a sex-crazed-psycho-gymnast sort of way.

HI KATERS I LUVV YOU LYKE SO MUCHERZ!!@!1!oneone!@

I'm so flippin' sweet.


by the way, you're not as cool as I am because you don't have a shirt with big sleeves that says, "I like your sleeves, they're real big." Endofstory.

Peace out, ATown,

well kids it turns out that im grounded, again, how lovely. Good thing my dad is on his way to some gay boat show so he should be gone for most of the night, i hope my sister leaves to so i dont have to deal with there bullshit....hmmm cant wait till tom! im in the worst mood right now....im going to go skurry off to get cheered up... check ya later kids..xoxo
HILLARY

Today, what a boring day, but the day is young so we will see what happenes later on yo.

Hmm lets see here, yesterday i had a gymnastics meet all flipin day long. It was fun though we did good:-)

well this has been fun.....update later.
http://xnameless.livejournal.com/2020.html

WOWZA! I haven't written in this sucker in like, 87734672876346878634 days. 

Last night was fun. John and Dan came over and my older sister Kate and her bestest friend Brittany took us to McDonald's. John and Dan were crazy faces and hitting there head on lamps and killing imaginary bugs and at the end of it all they got yelled at, by some flaming men. 

Rachel came over after that yay! We just sat around with Dan and John. Twas fun. While we were hanging out we got interrupted by a loud gay man's lisping voice, "Keep your penis'sssss in your pant'ssss!" hahaha it was a knee slapper.

Dan and John had to leave:-(

So Rach stayed the night we watched Zoolander, great movie.

Today wasn't one of the best days but, I did by some new cd's. Dropkick Murphy's and My Chemical Romance. You should check it out. Yep.

I have a eye infection:-( i look like Mr.Mendal. Haha i have wear my glasses for ten days. No biggie.

Right now I'm at Rachel's but she is on the phone with her boyfriend you might now him peter, a interesting character that boy. 

I'm off.
http://xnameless.livejournal.com/1775.html

Hello. Today was actually not to bad! yay! 

Alright I actually woke up on time today guy's, haha im such a nerd. 

School was good you know how it is just shakin it like a salt shaka(haha). Rachel and I had the worst head collision ever! David, John, Rachel, and I were having a great marker fight during 10th period and as me and rachel swerved to avoid getting colored all over our face's, we hit head's like no other! So we went to the nurse...dude she has one blue eye and one brown eye...I swear, she's a douche bag. She took her little flash light and put it all up in our eye's and acted like she actually new what she was doing, idiot haha. 

The bus ride was boring as usual. Don't you love how im telling you every single thing, im such a big fag. Well getting back to my day. I came home sat around...AND I GOT MY PHONE BACK..FINALY!!! being grounded blows like no other. 

INTERESTING FACT TIME
-The average person walks about around the world twice in a lifetime.
-Dolphins sleep with one eye open!
-Did u no that a giraffe can lick its ears with its 21 inch long tunge how cool/sick is that
-O and queen victoria was a druggy! haha jk she took marjuiana to ease the discomfort of her menstual cramps...god I am such a nerd...you know you think its interesting!
SHIT I GOTTA GO 
-

All I have to say is...

   MY SISTER IS A DUMB BITCH!

http://xnameless.livejournal.com/1273.html

Hello. Well sorry to say but, today was another sucky day with a little side of fun(wtf). My sister woke me up at like 11 in the frikin morning(and no that isn't remotely close to my definition of "sleeping in") Then she made me go to Oak brook Mall with her and her friend Brittany which, is quite a cool chick. At least I got to leave this hell hole and, the only reason I did was because my dad wasn't home! So my sister smuggled me out of the house(if you can smuggle things out? I donno..anyway). I guess the mall was fun. We got lost like 2 times and some stupid bitch backed up into us when she was trying to put her frickin convertible top up! What a douche head, the car is alright though! Haha, have you ever been to Nordstrom Rack? Well, its great! They had these absolutely monstrous gogo dancing boots, yup you guessed it I slipped those babies on and did a little dance haha. Then it was time to leave so we went to go drop off Brittany on the way there we saw some skater kids (haha hot too!) outside of 31 flavor's so Kate decided to turn up Toxic ha and got out and danced for them, we know they liked it...haha...Yup. Nothing would be complete tho without a great argument with my sister which left us not talking for the day. ahh the love we have for each other, atleast were talking again! Alright, I'm out. Later, peace.
http://xnameless.livejournal.com/852.html

Hello. God today blew, every day is blowing lately. Since i'm grounded from everthing imaginable(like this computer i am on right now)my family has decided that I don't exist anymore, there's is nothing to do and, I'm constantly surounded by bordum. It's like my dad wants me to go through social isolation, no phone or cell phone, no computer,no tv, the only thing i have is music and that's good i guess. O well it's my fault. I have nothing interesting to talk about because im the boringest person there is, i do have some poems i wrote but, i dont want to sound like some insaine person so ill keep those to my self. I know this sounds wrong but, i can't wait till school on monday. It will give me a chance to see everyone since im in frikin lock down. Well im gonna go because monique is going to make my journal all pretty, wow she is so talented!
http://xnameless.livejournal.com/713.html
